description: Source code for the MainActivity class of an Android application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game. It handles UI initialization, player interactions, game logic including win/draw detection, highlighting winning moves, and game reset with symbol selection.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity managing the Tic Tac Toe game UI and logic.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method initializing the UI, setting up click listeners, and starting a new game.

methods.name: onResetClicked
methods.description: Handler for reset button; resets the game and prompts for symbol selection.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicking a cell, updates game state, and checks for winner or draw.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner, returns winner symbol and combo indices if found.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Determines if the game is a draw (no empty cells and no winner).

methods.name: showWinner
methods.description: Highlights the winning combination and updates the UI to show the winner.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets game state and UI; optionally prompts player to choose X or O.

methods.name: updateStatusTurn
methods.description: Updates the status TextView to indicate current player's turn.

methods.name: promptPlayerChoice
methods.description: Displays a dialog for the user to select X or O as starting symbol.
